title: Fix CSS/font styling not loading in wiki
description: CSS styles from globals.css and IBM Plex fonts not applying. Browser shows Times font and no custom styling. Issue: nested layout was overriding root layout HTML structure. Need to verify fix works and styles load correctly.
close_reason: Fixed by duplicating root layout configuration in nested layout. Fonts and styling now loading correctly.

comments.author: will
comments.text: Root cause identified: Next.js font variables from layout.tsx not being applied to <html> tag. Rendered HTML shows '<html lang="en">' instead of '<html lang="en" class="...">'. Removed conflicting nested layout but fonts still not loading. Likely Next.js 15 font optimization issue or config problem. Need deeper investigation.

comments.author: will
comments.text: RESOLVED: Root cause was Next.js auto-creating app/[...slug]/layout.tsx with bare <html>/<body> tags that overrode the root layout. Fixed by copying the complete font configuration from app/layout.tsx to the nested layout. IBM Plex fonts, custom colors, and grid backgrounds now loading correctly. Screenshot confirms Cyber-Utilitarian aesthetic is working.
